alert.note: Alert for Bollinger (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 4:00PM CDT until August 08 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bollinger County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marquand, or 8 miles west of Marble Hill, moving southeast at 30 mph. There have been reports that this storm resulted in power outages as it moved through the nearby town of Fredericktown recently. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Grassy around 410 PM CDT. Marble Hill around 415 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
